description:
Join millions of users around the world in enjoying the #1 apps browser in the App Store and one of iLounge's 100 Essential Apps! G-Whizz! is the easiest way to use your favorite services and has been reimagined and recreated to be easier-to-use and more useful than ever.

In addition to everything that has made G-Whizz! so popular, you can now enjoy the following features:

• Support for iPhone 5
• Easy access to your favorite Google apps, plus Facebook and Twitter
• Support for multiple Google accounts (finally!)
• Support for more than a dozen languages
• Protect your data with an app passcode
• Personalize the app with infinite theme colors (available as an In-App Purchase)
• Ability to add even more great apps (through In-App Purchase)
• Enhanced browser with the ability to share to your favorite social networks
• Support for Pocket Change - a fun way to earn rewards just by using the app! This feature is optional.
• Plus much, much more

Try G-Whizz! today for FREE and discover what you've been missing!

As always, if G-Whizz! makes your life a little easier, the best way to thank us is to share it with your friends!

This app and content herein is © 2010-2013 G-Whizz! Apps, LLC.  All rights reserved.  G-Whizz!™ and the G! logo™ are trademarks of G-Whizz! Apps, LLC.  Certain other trademarks and copyrights referenced in the app are the property of their respective owners.
trackCensoredName: G-Whizz! for Google Apps - The #1 Apps Browser with Facebook, Twitter and more!
trackName: G-Whizz! for Google Apps - The #1 Apps Browser with Facebook, Twitter and more!
releaseNotes:
Thanks for your feedback! It's helping us make the app better every day. In this version we've made the following improvements:

• Support for iOS 8
• Support for iPhone 6/6 Plus
• Support for TouchID
• Support for 1Password Extension
• Bug fixes

3.3.0:
• Bug fixes

3.2.0:
• Support for Lootsie - a fun way to earn rewards just by using the app! This feature is optional.
• Support for Fleksy
• Bug fixes

3.1.0:
• Support for iOS 7
• Bug fixes

3.0.1:
• Bug fixes
• Ability to add even more great apps (through In-App Purchase)
• Support for Pocket Change - a fun way to earn rewards just by using the app! This feature is optional.

3.0.0:
Thanks for helping make G-Whizz! the most successful apps browser in the App Store with millions of fans around the world!

In addition to everything that has made G-Whizz! so popular, you can now enjoy the following features:

• Support for iPhone 5
• Support for multiple Google accounts (finally!)
• Support for more than a dozen languages
• Protect your data with an app passcode
• Personalize the app with infinite theme colors (available as an In-App Purchase)
• Enhanced browser with the ability to share to your favorite social networks
• Plus much, much more

As always, if G-Whizz! makes your life a little easier, the best way to thank us is to share it with your friends!
